!Display Setting

## Still Photography Mode

Choose from:

- SHUTTER SPEED
- APERTURE
- EXPO. COMP.
- ISO
- SHOOTING MODE
- PHOTOMETRY
- DRIVE MODE
- FOCUS MODE
- WHITE BALANCE
- IMAGE SIZE
- IMAGE QUALITY
- SHUTTER TYPE
- FILM SIMULATION
- DYNAMIC RANGE
- 35mm FORMAT MODE
- BOOST MODE
- DUAL IS MODE
- SELF-TIMER
- COMMUNICATION STATUS
- NONE
